loaded._comment: Extension loaded but disclosure hasn't loaded yet (shouldn't be observable)

enabled._comment: User has been presented with disclosure message

UIDisabled._comment: User saw disclosure and disabled the experiment

uninstalled._comment: Addon was removed other than disabled. This is the fallback also when an addon uninstall happens and the current state isn't a negative value.

disabled._comment: Addon was disabled, probably through about:addons. Exemptions include other minus states, if the user saw the banner and clicked ok they will end with -4 even on disable.

UIOk._comment: User saw disclosure and clicked OK
